resources.string: What is an IR blaster, anyway?

The “IR” in IR blaster simply stands for “infrared”. The hardware itself is also equally simple to understand. Traditional IR Devices requires the built-in Infrared(IR) feature in your device.

Sorry your mobile dont have IR Blaster, You need a phone having IR Blaster to use this app 

For any other question kindly contact us, 
 Thanks
